DOC.brief_summary: This study examine patient satisfaction spectacle independence use survey patient undergone uncomplicated cataract surgery presbyopia-correcting lens least 2 year prior administration survey .
DOC.brief_title: Satisfaction With Multifocal v Accommodating Lens Implants 2 Years After Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To compare patient-reported satisfaction multifocal v accommodate presbyopia-correcting least two year follow implantation either type implant . Number study subject : 200 ( half multifocal half accommodate lens implant ) In study , send secure , online questionnaire patient previously undergone cataract surgery least two year previously . Patients receive email invitation , click embed link verify identity date birth phone number , direct survey . The survey ask follow type question : - overall satisfaction surgery - would surgery ? - would choose ( elective ) lens implant ? - type activity ( read newspaper , driving , drive night , fine print ) require glass see clearly ? - experience glare halo symptom ? - bother patient symptom ? These data store secure server . Statistical analysis do statistician , use student 's t-test determine statistical significance difference patient different type lens implant . No intervention plan patient , analyze survey result . All patient identifying ( demographic ) information carefully protect accord HIPAA HITECH standard .
DOC.criteria: Patients uncomplicated bilateral cataract surgery either multifocal accommodate lens implant perform least 24 month previously Patients without astigmatic keratotomy simultaneous procedure may include , long exclusion criterion meet . Patients visually significant comorbidities ( corneal , retina , optic nerve disease ) , best judgment investigator , could affect satisfaction surgery Patients surgical complication either surgery ( capsule tear , iris trauma , decentered IOL , cystoid macular edema , etc . ) Patients â‰¥ grade 1 posterior capsule opacity last visit
